mapper.html:
Hi {{114.name}},

We are pleased to inform you that you have been selected to join our team!

Your skills and experience will be a valuable addition, and we are eager to see your contributions and having you on our team.

Please await further details regarding your onboarding process, which will be communicated shortly.

New Starter Document Form Link

We look forward to working together.

Smile Cliniq Hiring Team

Smile Cliniq
mapper.subject: Youâ€™re hired! Welcome to the Smile Cliniq Team

mapper.html:
Dear Managers,

We are pleased to inform you that a new employee has been successfully hired and added to our team.

New Employee Details:

  • Date Hired: {{formatDate(now; "DD-MM-YYYY")}}
  • Name: {{114.name}}
  • Email: {{114.email}}
  • Position: {{142.Title}}

Required Action:

Please log into the onboarding platform and select the starting date for {{114.name}}'s induction process. This step is essential to ensure a smooth onboarding experience and proper scheduling of all necessary orientation activities.

Next Steps:

  • Access the onboarding platform at this link
  • Navigate to {{114.name}}'s profile
  • Set the induction start date
  • Click the Start Onboarding button
  • Confirm all onboarding materials are prepared

Please complete this action in timely manner to ensure all preparations are in place for {{114.name}}'s first day.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
mapper.subject: New Employee Hired - Action Required: {{114.name}}

mapper.html:
Hi {{114.name}},

Thank you for your recent application.

We are pleased to invite you to an second interview with us at one of our branches below.
Location: {{114.location}}.

This interview will be face to face, and you will spend some time shadowing with us.

Please Ensure All Information is Correct in the Booking Page.

Schedule Interview

We look forward to seeing you!

Yours Sincerely,

Smile Cliniq Hiring Team

Smile Cliniq
mapper.subject: Smile Cliniq Application Update

mapper.html:
Dear {{114.name}},

Thank you for your application to Smile Cliniq. We appreciate your interest and the time you have invested in applying for the {{89.Title}} position.

We received a large number of applications, and after carefully reviewing all of them, we regret to inform you that you have not progressed to the next stage. Due to the volume of applications, we are unable to provide individual feedback at this time.

At Smile Cliniq, we highly value patient reviews, comprehensive patient portfolios (including before-and-after cases), significant dental experience (a minimum of 4 years), and postgraduate education. Most of the time, applicants do not advance to the next stage because of one or more of these factors. We hope to see these aspects improved and would appreciate your application again in the future.

Thank you once again for your time and interest in Smile Cliniq.

Best Regards,

Smile Cliniq Hiring Team

Smile Cliniq
mapper.subject: Smile Cliniq Application Update

mapper.html:
Dear {{114.name}},

Thank you for your interest in joining our team. While we regret to inform you that we are unable to proceed together this time, we were genuinely impressed by your application.

We would love to retain your information on file and reach out should future opportunities arise.

Wishing you all the best in your career journey.

Kindest Regards,

The Smile Cliniq Hiring Team
mapper.subject: Thank You for Your Application
